channel.title: all pleb.fi events on the most pleb conf

item.title: pleb.fi austin
item.description: pleb.fi /austin in austin august 21st-22nd (weekend before bitblockboom dallas) bring your pajamas (there’s a hackathon) Tweet our lovely event sponsors .sponsors-box { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; } .sponsor { } trammell venture partners lnpay judica lincoln network unchained capital sphinx.chat anon supporter <3

item.title: pleb.fi miami
item.description: pleb.fi /miami never stop improvin bitcoin, but specifically on june 6th 2021 in miami think outside the box june 6th, 2021, miami at a secret location, 12-5pm. not the best. not the brightest. the plebs. like 50 of them. come for a day of hacking, mentorship, workshops, and discussions on how to contribute to bitcoin functionality accelerationism and build decentralized finance applications on bitcoin.

item.title: pleb.fi miami 2022

PLEBBER april 4-5th* 2022 in miami its sapioszn get in loser we're buidling if you dont come you will have to turn in your pleb card come for 2 days of hacking, mentorship, workshops, and discussions on how to contribute to bitcoin functionality accelerationism and build kickass applications on bitcoin using sapio, taproot, ctv, and more.
